: : Kup : :
While walking, Kup responds to Condor.
Kup: Yeah. You were right Condor, Flicker is a enemy. He is trying to escape the base right now with Nightlight as his prisoner.
Kup came around a corner and saw Flicker at the end of the hall. He was working at a computer terminal, and then bound Nightlight's hands.
Kup raised his plasma rifle and aproached slowly.
Kup: Give it up Flicker, and let her go. Dead or alive your coming with me!
 cardhead649 <cardhead649@...> wrote:OOC: Racoon, they're still in the base - not for much longer, 
though ...

Flicker::

"We'll see about that, Autobot," Flicker growls.  He knows his 
cover's been blown, so he pulls out one of his various spy devices as 
he drags Nightlight down the hall.  Plugging it into a computer 
terminal, he sets it to scan for and steal Rodimus Prime's access 
codes.  Flicker's a smart bot - he knows nobody can override a 
command from the base commander except a master hacker; especially 
when it's a master hacker posing as the commander.

While the gadget's at work, he pulls some wire from subspace - meant 
to be part of another device that doesn't help him now.  "Face the 
wall, girl," he orders his captive.  "Hands behind your back."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightlight:
> 
> "It's done"thought the femme, her baby was safe... now she had to 
> find up what she would do to put herself safe. It not would be 
easy, 
> she only hoped that someone noticed that she lied when she 
mentioned 
> Rodimus and discovered  that her message was a cover message for 
> help. When would they notice it? now or when Rodimus came back?
> 
> Her answers were responded when she hear Kup's voice, she felt that 
> her aparently calm was starting to brake down. "Please, help me" 
> thought the femme.
> 
> ***********************************
> Condor:
> 
> In a part of the ship Condor saw the little Cam. "Hi" said the 
> male "Where you go?"
> 
> That time he received a message of Kup "Kup??" said the 
male "here's 
> Condor... What's up????" a unpleasant feeling stuck him "Is about 
> Flicker???? Do you know where's he?"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > 
> > : : Kup : :
> > Kup(via comm): Understood Aerotaur. Kup out.
> > Kup closed the channel and continued on his way. As he was 
waiting 
> for Condor to report he got an idea. He opens a channel to Flicker. 
> He was sure that Flicker was not who he said he was now and decides 
> that he can play some mind games.
> > Kup(via comm): Flicker, I know what your up to. Give it up. 
You'll 
> never get out fo the base.
> >  Rudra656@a... wrote:::Aerotaur:: 
> >       "Er, I'd love to help sir, but I've got to watch their baby 
> for the time being.  I just wouldn't feel right leaving it here 
> alone.  I'm sure there are others in the base who can find them."  
> He sighs and closes the comlink to walk over to baby Elita.  "I 
> think you're mom's in a lot of trouble.  But I'm sure she'll be 
> okay."  He picks her up again and rocks her in his arms.
